title: Find Mol
content:
Find Mol Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Shadow-Cursed Lands Reward Mol as Ally

Find Mol is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find Mol can be acquired during Act 2. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Find Mol Objectives

Keep an eye out for Mol. Search for Mol in Moonrise Towers. Search for Mol in the Mind Flayer Colony. Search for Mol on the path to Baldur's Gate. Search
